auto.help: Auto detect URL type and download
auto.example: Supported input sources: Signal, Telegram, Line, Kakao

signal.help: Download signal stickers from a URL as input

telegram.help: Download telegram stickers from a URL as input

line.help: Download line stickers from a URL / ID as input
line.example:
Example: https://store.line.me/stickershop/product/1234/en
 OR https://line.me/S/sticker/1234/?lang=en OR line://shop/detail/1234 OR 1234

kakao.help: Download kakao stickers from a URL / ID as input
kakao.example:
Example: https://e.kakao.com/t/xxxxx OR kakaotalk://store/emoticon/4404400
OR https://emoticon.kakao.com/items/xxxxx OR 4404400

local.help: Load files from local directory on computer
local.example: No need to supply any URL
